definition[0]: the act of moving soldiers away from the area where they were fighting
definition[1]: a reduction in the value, amount, or level of something
example[0]: a significant pullback in the stock market
definition[2]: the action of a plane moving backwards, away from an airport terminal (=building where people wait to get on the plane)
definition[3]: a situation in which the price suddenly changes and goes back down or back up
example[1]: The pullback in oil weâ€™ve seen in recent days is likely to continue.
